title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1154.7 - Payment of fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1154.7 - Payment of fees

State Regulations

No person shall moor any vessel or other watercraft at an
authority mooring, land or take off an aircraft on or from a public landing
area, or use a public landing area, public ramp and apron area, public
passenger ramp and apron area, public cargo ramp and apron area, or a public
aircraft parking and storage area, except upon the payment of such fees and
charges as may from time to time be prescribed by the authority, unless such
person is entitled to use such area under a lease or special
contract. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1154.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
